item.title: E.A. Sween Announces Product Recalls Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
item.description: E.A. Sween Company announced the recall of multiple products due to possible contamination of Listeria monocytogenes
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Rong Shing Trading Ny Inc. Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Milk and Eggs in Glam Day Nougat Candy
item.description: RONG SHING NY Trading Inc. of Brooklyn, NY, is recalling its 6-ounce packages of GLAM DAY NOUGAT CANDY because they may contain undeclared milk and egg allergens. Consumers who are allergic to milk and/ or eggs may run the risk of serious or life-threatening allergic reactions if they consume this p
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Northern Tier Bakery LLC Issues Voluntary Recall
item.description: Northern Tier Bakery LLC of Saint Paul Park, Minnesota, is voluntarily recalling Chicken Salad Sandwiches sold under the brand name SuperMom’s (UPC 763913801286) and under the brand name Hometown Kitchen (UPC 763913260151).
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Coborn’s, Inc. Issues Recall of Select Chicken Salad Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
item.description: Coborn's, Inc. is recalling select chicken salad products, which may have been contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes, an organism which can cause serious and sometimes fatal infections in young children, frail or elderly people, and others with weakened immune systems.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Mical Seafood Inc Recalls Tuna Products for Possible Scombroid Poisoning
item.description: Voluntarily initiated a recall of frozen, wild-caught yellowfin tuna poke cubes, tuna loins, tuna ground meat and 6oz tuna steaks because of potentially elevated levels of histamine. Elevated levels of histamines can produce an allergic reaction called scombroid fish poisoning.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Lipari Foods Issues Recall of Bulk Chicken Salads and Chicken Salad Sandwiches Due to Potential Contamination of Listeria Monocytogenes
item.description: Voluntary recall of Lipari Old Tyme Bulk Chicken Salad, Lipari Old Tyme Bulk Cranberry Almond Chicken Salad, Premo Chicken Salad Wedge Sandwiches, Fresh Grab Chicken Salad Wedge Sandwiches, and Premo Signature Cranberry Almond Chicken Salad on Croissant due to Listeria monocytogenes
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Euphoria Fancy Food Inc. Recalls “Capitan K Salmon Fillet” Due to Possible Health Risk
item.description: Euphoria Fancy Food Inc of Brooklyn, NY is recalling its 7.05 oz packages of “CAPITAN K” salmon slightly salted pieces because they may be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Euphoria Fancy Food Inc Recalls “Capitan K Salmon Fillet” Due to Possible Health Risk Update
item.description: Euphoria Fancy Food Inc of Brooklyn, NY is recalling its 7.05 oz packages of “CAPITAN K” salmon slightly salted pieces because they may be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes, an organism which can cause serious and sometimes fatal infections in young children, frail or elderly people and other
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Super World Trading Inc. Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Sulfites in Dried Date
item.description: Super World Trading Inc. of Brooklyn, New York is recalling 10 cases of 12 oz Dried Date with incorrect label as shown below, because it may contain undeclared sulfites. People who have an allergy or severe sensitivity to sulfites run the risk of serious or life-threatening allergic reaction if they
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Dorset Cheese Voluntarily Recalled by North Atlantic and Northeast Whole Foods Market Stores Due to Possible Health Risk
item.description: In response to a recall from Consider Bardwell Farm, Whole Foods Market stores in the Northeast and North Atlantic regions are voluntarily recalling Dorset cheese because of a potential contamination of Listeria monocytogenes
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Cellect Products Inc. and Oglethorpe Ltd. Issue Voluntary Worldwide Recall of Cellect Unflavored Powder & Essentials Factor Cell Synergy Unflavored Powder, Lot #041907 Due to Potential Unsafe Levels of Arsenic and Lead
item.description: The Cellect Unflavored Powder & Essentials Factor Cell Synergy Unflavored Powder has been found to have unsafe levels of Arsenic and Lead.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Mavidon Issues Voluntary Worldwide Recall of LemonPrep® Tubes and Single Use Cups
item.description: Mavidon is voluntarily recalling 21 lots of LemonPrep® 4 ounce tubes and single use cups to user level. These products have been found to be contaminated with Burkholderia cepacia. The specific lots are listed below:
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Consider Bardwell Farm Recalls Dorset, Slyboro, and Experience Because of Possible Health Risk
item.description: These products may be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes, an organism which can cause serious and sometimes fatal infections in young children, frail or elderly people and others with weakened immune systems. Healthy individuals may suffer only short-term symptoms such as high fever, severe he
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Rong Shing Trading Ny Inc. Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Milk in Ganchi Naiweitangpian Candies
item.description: RONG SHING NY Trading Inc. of Brooklyn, NY, is recalling its 280-gram (9.8-ounce) packages of GANCHI NAIWEITANGPIAN candy because they may contain undeclared milk allergen. Consumers who are allergic to milk may run the risk of serious or life-threatening allergic reactions if they consume this prod
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: TDBBS Voluntarily Recalls Pig Ear Pet Treats No Illnesses Reported; Strictly Precautionary
item.description: “This recall has been initiated due to possible Salmonella contamination, which poses a health risk. It is important to know that no illnesses have been reported, and the amount of affected product is minimal.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Keurig Dr Pepper Announces Voluntary Withdrawal of Unflavored Peñafiel Mineral Spring Water that Does Not Meet FDA Bottled Water Quality Standards
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper today announced it will voluntarily withdraw Peñafiel unflavored mineral spring water products, imported from Mexico, due to the presence of violative levels of arsenic.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Weaver Fundraising, LLC Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Almonds, Cashews, and Pecans in Trail’s End Chocolatey Caramel Crunch Sold in Houston and Corpus Christi, Texas
item.description: Weaver Fundraising, LLC (Indianapolis, IN) is voluntarily recalling 15 oz. tins containing Trail’s End Chocolatey Caramel Crunch because they may inadvertently contain almonds, cashews and pecans.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Apotex Corp. Issues Voluntary Nationwide Recall of Ranitidine Tablets 75mg and 150mg (All pack sizes and Formats) due to the potential for Detection of an Amount of Unexpected Impurity,N-nitrosodimethylamine (NDMA) Impurity in the product
item.description: Apotex Corp. is voluntarily, on a precautionary basis, recalling Ranitidine Tablets 75mg and 150mg (All pack sizes and Formats) to the Retail level. Apotex has learned from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and other Global regulators that some ranitidine medicines including brand and generic fo
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Sandoz Inc. Issues Voluntary Recall of Ranitidine Hydrochloride Capsules 150mg and 300mg Due to An Elevated Amount of Unexpected Impurity, N-Nitrosodimethylamine (NDMA), in the Product
item.description: – Sandoz Inc. is voluntarily recalling all quantities and lots within expiry of Ranitidine Hydrochloride Capsules in the US to the consumer level because of confirmed contamination with N-Nitrosodimethylamine (NDMA) above levels established by the FDA in batches of Sandoz Ranitidine Hydrochloride C
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: B. Braun Medical Inc. Issues Voluntary Nationwide Recall of one lot of one catalog item number of an Infusomat® Space Volumetric Infusion Pump Administration Set, Due to Potential Leakage
item.description: B. Braun Medical Inc. [B. Braun] initiated a voluntary recall of one lot of Infusomat® Space Volumetric Infusion Pump Administration Sets (Catalog Number 363032, Lot Number 0061641410). The recalled administration sets are used to deliver parenteral fluids. B. Braun identified through customer compl
item.dc:creator: FDA
